channel.title: Photography on Francisco
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on Francisco

item.title: Solar Eclipse
item.description: I got to watch the solar eclipse yesterday and managed to capture a nice photo. I’m living in California, so we didn’t see much in terms of darkness, but the outline of the moon was certainly there. To get the exposure right, I had to stack all the ND filters I own in front of my camera lens, 8 in total. I held the mismatched stack of filters with my left hand while trying to hold my camera steady in my right.
